description: Tags automatically added to saved object assets.

asset_ids.description: Asset IDs where this tag is going to be added. If two or more pacakges define the same tag, there will be just one tag created in Kibana and all the assets will be using the same tag.

asset_types.description: This tag will be added to all the assets of these types included in the package. If two or more pacakges define the same tag, there will be just one tag created in Kibana and all the assets will be using the same tag.
